class.name: class
class.description: Space-separated list of classes for styling.

lang.name: lang
lang.description: Language code for the element's content.

tabIndex.name: tabIndex
tabIndex.description: Tab order of the element for keyboard navigation.

hidden.name: hidden
hidden.description: Indicates that the element is not relevant.

autoFocus.name: autoFocus
autoFocus.description: Indicates that the element should automatically receive focus when the page loads.

draggable.name: draggable
draggable.description: Specifies whether the element is draggable.

contentEditable.name: contentEditable
contentEditable.description: Specifies whether the element's content is editable.

spellCheck.name: spellCheck
spellCheck.description: Indicates whether the element should be checked for spelling errors.

accessKey.name: accessKey
accessKey.description: Defines a shortcut key to activate/focus the element.

dir.name: dir
dir.description: Defines the text direction for the content in the element.

popover.name: popover
popover.description: Controls popover behavior for the element.

inputMode.name: inputMode
inputMode.description: Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user.

inert.name: inert
inert.description: Prevents user interaction with the element and its subtree.

enterKeyHint.name: enterKeyHint
enterKeyHint.description: Hints at the action label for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

translate.name: translate
translate.description: Specifies whether the content of the element should be translated.

itemtype.name: itemtype
itemtype.description: Specifies the type of item for microdata.

itemscope.name: itemscope
itemscope.description: Defines the scope of microdata item.

role.name: role
role.description: Defines the role of the element for accessibility.

aria-atomic.name: aria-atomic
aria-atomic.description: Indicates whether assistive technologies should present all changes to the element as a whole.

aria-busy.name: aria-busy
aria-busy.description: Indicates whether an element is being modified and assistive technologies should wait.

aria-controls.name: aria-controls
aria-controls.description: Identifies the element(s) whose contents or presence are controlled by the current element.

aria-current.name: aria-current
aria-current.description: Indicates the current item within a container or set.

aria-describedby.name: aria-describedby
aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element(s) that describe the object.

aria-description.name: aria-description
aria-description.description: Defines a string value that describes or annotates the current element.

aria-details.name: aria-details
aria-details.description: Identifies the element that provides additional details.

aria-disabled.name: aria-disabled
aria-disabled.description: Indicates that the element is perceivable but disabled.

aria-dropeffect.name: aria-dropeffect
aria-dropeffect.description: Indicates what operations can be performed by dragging.

aria-errormessage.name: aria-errormessage
aria-errormessage.description: Identifies the element that provides an error message.

aria-flowto.name: aria-flowto
aria-flowto.description: Identifies the next element in an alternate reading order.

aria-grabbed.name: aria-grabbed
aria-grabbed.description: Indicates an element's "grabbed" state in drag-and-drop operations.

aria-haspopup.name: aria-haspopup
aria-haspopup.description: Indicates the availability and type of interactive popup element.

aria-hidden.name: aria-hidden
aria-hidden.description: Indicates whether the element is exposed to an accessibility API.

aria-invalid.name: aria-invalid
aria-invalid.description: Indicates the entered value does not conform to the format expected.

aria-keyshortcuts.name: aria-keyshortcuts
aria-keyshortcuts.description: Indicates keyboard shortcuts that can be used to activate or focus an element.

aria-label.name: aria-label
aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

aria-labelledby.name: aria-labelledby
aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element(s) that label the current element.

aria-live.name: aria-live
aria-live.description: Indicates that an element will be updated, and describes the types of updates.

aria-owns.name: aria-owns
aria-owns.description: Identifies an element that is owned by the current element.

aria-relevant.name: aria-relevant
aria-relevant.description: Indicates what notifications the user agent should trigger for changes in a live region.

aria-roledescription.name: aria-roledescription
aria-roledescription.description: Defines a human-readable description for the role of an element.

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.description: Defines the date and time of the element.
